original_text: And when the messengers of John were departed, he began to speak unto the people concerning John, What went ye out into the wilderness for to see? A reed shaken with the wind?
korean_text: 요한이 보낸 자가 떠난 후에 예수께서 무리에게 요한에 대하여 말씀하시되 너희가 무엇을 보려고 광야에 나갔더냐 바람에 흔들리는 갈대냐

sentences.original_text: And when the messengers of John were departed,
he began to speak unto the people
What went ye out into the wilderness for to see?
A reed shaken with the wind?
